sys_remote_update_set.description:
Hardik,
Thank you for taking out the time to research this. The database and server exists as user has mentioned in the ticket. The server name (COANETSQLSRVA) is a SQL Cluster name. I am not sure if SQL cluster names are identified in the request form. But we have lot of SQL server Clusters in Acceptance and Production. We would need this to be pulled up in database requests for the users to create proper requests.
In the meantime, how do we get the user to get past the error he is facing?
Thanks, Krutarth R Patel | Sr. SQL Database Administrator
sys_remote_update_set.name: HV - Update Server Ref Qual in Database Request
